snippet: A niche in business aviation is helping not just the companies that provide long-range aircraft, but also those that make them.
abstract: Business travelers are increasingly flying to hard-to-reach places, helping fuel revival in private jet industry; nowhere is demand greater than in the longest flights to most exotic locales, requiring planes that can fly up to 13 hours without refueling; Argus International says number of long-range flights rose 18.7 percent through Oct 2013 compared with same period 2012, while total business aviation flights declined 0.7 percent.
lead_paragraph: A niche in business aviation is helping not just the companies that provide long-range aircraft, but also those that make them.

headline.main: Travel to Far-Flung Places Spurs Private Jet Growth
headline.print_headline: Travel to Far-Flung Places Spurs Private Jet Growth
